00050     void setBuffer(const c8 *pBuffer, u32 iBufferSize, bool bRecalcSize=true) {
00051       memcpy(m_sBuffer,pBuffer,iBufferSize);
00052       m_iCnt=0;
00053       if (bRecalcSize) {
00054         m_pBufferPos=m_sBuffer+iBufferSize;

00056       }
00057       else m_pBufferPos=m_sBuffer;
00058     }
